headline.0: Rewarding Brand Switchers at the Expense of Loyal Customers Will Ruin Your Business
headline.1: Rewarding Brand Switchers at the Expense of Loyal Customers Will Ruin Your Business

short_description.0: Mobile service providers are doing it. Banks are doing it. Just about every company, run by people without marketing brains, is rewarding brand switchers at the expense of their loyal customers. That is what is happening under the guise of attracting new business.
